attributes.action: Allow weddings of any number as long as there is social distancing
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the ban on weddings
Open places of worship to allow ceremonies
attributes.background: Allow couples to celebrate with their family and friends. It is a joyous once in a life time experience. There are probably 100 people in Asda at any one time and yet people can still not get married.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
